about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I’m a software developer with over 12 years of experience, having started in quality assurance and evolved into building modern, scalable systems. Throughout my journey, I’ve taken part in challenging projects at companies of all sizes, contributing to frontend, backend, and at times, infrastructure.
about.paragraph2: I have solid experience with technologies like JavaScript, TypeScript, React, React Native, Angular, Node.js, NestJS, and Java, along with practical knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases. I've also worked with CI/CD tools, Docker, and AWS services, supporting application stability and continuous delivery.
about.paragraph3: Currently, I’m expanding my knowledge in Flutter and conversational English, while developing personal projects focused on learning and innovation.
about.paragraph4: I enjoy learning, teaching, and building with quality.

timeline.2012: Started in software quality at TOTVS, building a solid foundation in development best practices.
timeline.2015: Transitioned to frontend development, becoming a technical reference in the team with a focus on Angular and modern technologies.
timeline.2020: Expanded into backend with Node.js, NestJS, and Java, aiming for a more complete and fullstack role.
timeline.2021: Worked on mobile projects with React Native and served as a Tech Lead at Zé Express (Ambev), driving product evolution, architecture, and best practices.
timeline.2025: Frontend Architect at nstech, I have the challenge of unifying frontend times and stacks for a single path, following the same best practices around a unique Design System.

hero.description: Software Developer focused on creating efficient, modern, and scalable solutions.
